question: In which of the following weeks the heart of human embryo starts beating?
option1: in the first week of its development
option2: in the third week of its development
option3: in the fourth week of its development
option4: in the sixth week of its development
answer: in the sixth week of its development
explanation: By 6 weeks, baby\'s heart starts beating 110 times a minute. It has four hollow chambers, each with an entrance and an exit to allow blood to flow in and out of each chamber. In just two more weeks, that number will rise to 150-170 beats a minute.
